description.value:
Flames flow out of you in a cascade, engulfing everyone in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30]. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level -4)/2)+4)d6[fire]|traits:area-damage] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.kineticist.dc)|basic:true] save against your class DC. A creature that critically fails its save is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.
